text: Helena Zoila Tirona Benitez (June 27, 1914 â€“ July 14, 2016) was a Filipino academic and administrator of the Philippine Women's University. She served in the Senate of the Philippines from 1967Senators Profile - Helena Benitez. Senate of the Philippines. Accessed on 2015-08-21. until Congress was closed when martial law was declared in 1972, and at the Batasang Pambansa from 1978 until it was abolished in 1986. Benitez also founded the Bayanihan Dance Company. Benitez died on July 14, 2016 in Manila, aged 102. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Centenarians Category:Politicians from Manila Category:Filipino academics
